import React from"react";import{useState}from"react";import $ from"jquery";import'../../css/accueil.css';import{useLanguage}from'../../store/languageContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const{language,setLanguage,languageData}=useLanguage();const[name,setName]=useState("");const[result,setResult]=useState("");const handleChange=e=>{setName(e.target.value);};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const form=$(e.target);fetch(form.attr("action"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/x-www-form-urlencoded"},body:new URLSearchParams(new FormData(form[0])).toString()}).then(response=>response.text()).then(data=>{setResult(data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error:',error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"wrapper fit-box center-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{"data-translate-key":"titleSearch",children:languageData.titleSearch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{action:"http://localhost:8000/server.php",method:"post",onSubmit:event=>handleSubmit(event),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"input-box ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"search",name:"search",value:name,onChange:event=>handleChange(event)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{class:"btn",type:"submit","data-translate-key":"search",children:languageData.search})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"result"})]})});}export default Home;/*
